snippet: The United States survived an early scare to beat Belarus, 5-3, while Finland turned on the style to defeat France, 7-, 1 in Group H games at the world championships in Helsinki, Finland, on Thursday.
abstract: United States defeats Belarus, 5-3, at ice hockey world championships.
lead_paragraph: The United States survived an early scare to beat Belarus, 5-3, while Finland turned on the style to defeat France, 7-, 1 in Group H games at the world championships in Helsinki, Finland, on Thursday.

headline.seo: U.S. Beats Belarus at World Championships
headline.main: U.S. Beats Belarus at World Championships
headline.print_headline: U.S. Beats Belarus at World Championships
